info.description: Through gifts and auctions, assemble the prettiest, most exhaustive book collection possible and sway the review priorities of the Church so that your monastery's library gets the top rating.
info.helpText:
• The vertical holders below each player seat are designed for showcasing everyone's cards during the final scoring; but you can also slot the card currently on auction in one of them as a bookmark of who the current auctioneer is.
• The Peek holder is a private mini-hand separate from your main hand. It's used in the gift half of the game by the active player to peek at a card before distributing it.
• The Public display holder is where cards gifted to other players temporarily go, as well as showing the amount of gold spent on winning bids.

countRoutine.note: Update card counts for each player

fields.text: Are you sure that you want to start a new game and that all players have already taken a seat?

clickRoutine.note: Move player aids and remove cards

fields.text: Are you sure that you want to end the game and reveal everyone's hands?
